Roger Smith OBE
Client — A Collected Man
Subject — Stephen Bayley

Episode one of an ongoing video series for A Collected Man, a vintage watch retailer for whom we built an editorial strategy for. This film was produced to focus on the subject of time spent, rather than typical product focussed editorial in the watch industry. This episode features Stephen Bayley, co-founder of the London Design Museum, describing his morning routine.
A Collected Man — Between the Hours Of
Stephen Bayley
Client — Omega
Subject — Craig Muir

Episode two of a five part video series for Omega watches, celebrating the 70th anniversary of the Seamaster wristwatch. We produced, directed and edited the series, which was distributed online via A Collected Man. This episode features Craig Muir, a commercial saturation diver and watch collector, residing on the remote Orkney islands, north of Scotland.
Omega — Seamaster 70th Anniversary
Craig Muir
Client — Omega
Subject — Michael Hill

Episode two of a five part video series for Omega watches, celebrating the 70th anniversary of the Seamaster wristwatch. We produced, directed and edited the series, which was distributed online via A Collected Man. This episode features Michael Hill, the co-owner and creative director of Drake’s clothing in London.
Omega — Seamaster 70th Anniversary
Michael Hill
Client — Omega
Subject — Pete Reed OBE

Episode four of a five part video series for Omega watches, celebrating the 70th anniversary of the Seamaster wristwatch. We produced, directed and edited the series, which was distributed online via A Collected Man. This episode features lt. cdr. Pete Reed OBE, a three time olympic gold medallist for rowing in Beijing 2008, London 2012 and Rio De Janero 2016.
Omega — Seamaster 70th Anniversary
Pete Reed OBE
Client — Omega
Subject — Roger Smith OBE

Episode two of a five part video series for Omega watches, celebrating the 70th anniversary of the Seamaster wristwatch. We produced, directed and edited the series, which was distributed online via A Collected Man. This episode features Roger Smith OBE, a world renowned British watchmaker, who was the only apprentice to the master watchmaker George Daniels.
Omega — Seamaster 70th Anniversary
Roger Smith OBE
